GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v4.14.283
GSD.description:
usb: usbip: fix a refcount leak in stub_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit f20d2d3b3364ce6525c050a8b6b4c54c8c19674d, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit 3ff67445750a84de67faaf52c6e1895cb09f2c56. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: usbip: fix a refcount leak in stub_probe()
